name: UpdatePayrollInput
description:
Partially update payroll input details by ID.

Use this tool to partially update an existing payroll input instance for a specified ID. Before calling this tool, retrieve current payroll input data using GET /payrollInputs. The 'worker' field cannot be updated. Field editability is determined by specific conditions related to the payroll inputs.

parameters.name: workday_resource_id
parameters.description: The unique Workday ID of the payroll input resource to be updated.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: payroll_input_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the fields to update for the payroll input instance. Ensure fields comply with editability rules: 'all', 'none', or 'endDateOnly'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
